shirband.title: ShirBand
shirband.subtitle: A clothing shopping online for women on web application
shirband.description: This is a project in the course Web Programming of Media Technology and I am full stack developer to make a shopping page and admin page. In front-end, I have made that with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap. And Back-end, I use Firebase for Database and Hosting this web app.

arproject.title: Muscular (Lower)
arproject.subtitle: An AR application about Muscular System (Lower Boudy)
arproject.description: This is a mini-project in the course of Media Technology. This is an AR application for learning an anatomy about Lower Muscular System with Marker-based AR. This app is made with Unity to make a application and Vuforia to build and run AR in this application

heartchir.title: HeartCir
heartchir.subtitle: A 3D Instruction programme about Blood Circulation System with heart rate module
heartchir.description: This is a mini-project in the course of Media Technology. HeartCir is made with Unity and the heart rate module is made with Arduino. HeartCir is simulate a heartbeat of human heart. This programme has 2 system. First system, you can set rate to show how heart rate. Another system is a real time, you can use the heart rate module to show how your heart beats

rescape.title: Rescape
rescape.subtitle: A VR game with heart rate module to escape the robots
rescape.description: This is a project in NSC2021. Rescape is a VR-RPG game that made with Unity and play with heart rate module that made with Arduino. I'm responsible to make a heart rate module and design some map in this game The heart rate module during in this game is show on right hand and depend on a Detect Circle. If detect circle is detect to a robot, the game will restart. So If detect circle is wider, player will escape harder.Rescape is a game about Teen who is growing up with MOM that is a robot. One Day, he find Will who have injury and talking with him how to escape this place with the robots.

sweetboyrunner.title: SweetBoy Runner
sweetboyrunner.subtitle: A 3D endless game
sweetboyrunner.description: This is a mini-project in the course Computer Programming of Media Technology. SweetBoy Runner is a 3D endless game that made with Unity. This game is about a boy who runs to collect as many snacks as possible. When running into an object, the game will be over.
